AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: Deputy who initiated the traffic stop, familiar with Haston's work as a narcotics investigator
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: narcotics investigator who provided traffic violation information to Deputy Cox
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Heather Vargas: involved in providing information that led to the traffic stop
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: truck driver who was stopped by Deputy Cox, identified himself and stated he was not used to driving a truck with a trailer attached
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel Martin Huerta: owner of the truck and trailer, first name mentioned by Federico Saldana during the traffic stop
